headline: The Bull Case For Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Could Change Following $2.75B Buyback and Upbeat Guidance
summary: Mettler-Toledo International reported strong third quarter 2025 results, raising its full-year guidance and authorizing an additional US$2.75 billion share repurchase program. The company emphasized continued focus on small bolt-on acquisitions and supply chain actions to offset tariff headwinds, reinforcing management's confidence in operational and financial performance. We'll examine how this major share repurchase authorization and upbeat outlook may influence Mettler-Toledo's...
